title: Recruiting Trail Puts Basketball’s Changes on Display
description: Young prospects in men’s basketball have numerous ways to impress college coaches (and options to bypass them). But the way coaches are looking for new talent has changed, too.
dc:creator: Billy Witz
media:credit: Rachel Wisniewski for The New York Times
media:description: Symeon Efstathiou at the Hun School of Princeton, N.J., on Wednesday.
